casebody.data:
STATE OF MONTANA, Plaintiff, vs. WILLIAM EDWARD STREEPER, JR., Defendant.

DECISION

No. 4898 DATED this 18th day of March, 1977.

The application of the above-named defendant for a review of the sentence of Ten (10) years with Five (5) years suspended imposed on October 27, 1976, was fully heard and after a careful consideration of the entire matter it is decided that: The sentence be and remain as originally imposed.

We wish to thank Harold Dye, Attorney at Law, Missoula, Montana for his assistance to the defendant and this Court.

SENTENCE REVIEW DIVISION

Jack D. Shanstrom, Chairman; Robert C. Sykes.
